intro: Psychotria kelelensis, commonly known as the Kilelensis Psychotria, is a species of flowering plant in the Rubiaceae family. It is native to tropical regions of Africa, particularly found in countries like Kenya and Tanzania. The plant is characterized by its small, elliptical leaves and clusters of small, white to pale yellow flowers. It thrives in humid, shaded environments, often growing in forest understories. Due to its ornamental value and potential medicinal properties, it is sometimes cultivated in botanical gardens and research settings.
